TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class TreeNodeCollection : System.Collections.ICollection, System.Web.UI.IStateManager

.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TreeNodeCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Web.UI.IStateManager
Public NotInheritable Class TreeNodeCollection Implements ICollection, IStateManager
public ref class TreeNodeCollection sealed : System::Collections::ICollection, System::Web::UI::IStateManager

summary.span: 表示 控件中的 对象的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects in the control.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于存储和管理集合的中的对象控件。The class is used to store and manage a collection of objects in the control. 控件使用在两个其属性的类。The control uses the class in two of its properties. 它存储在其根节点属性和在其所选的节点属性。It stores its root nodes in the property and its selected nodes in the property. 集合还用于属性来存储子节点 （如果有）。The collection is also used for the property to store child nodes (if any). 类支持多种方法可访问集合中的项：The class supports several ways to access the items in the collection: - 使用索引器以检索直接在特定的从零开始索引的对象。Use the indexer to retrieve a object directly at a specific zero-based index. - 使用方法来创建可用于循环访问集合的枚举。Use the method to create an enumerator that can be used to iterate through the collection. - 使用`foreach`(C#) 或`For Each`(Visual Basic) 来循环访问集合。Use `foreach` (C#) or `For Each` (Visual Basic) to iterate through the collection. - 使用方法复制到集合的内容对象。Use the method to copy the contents of the collection into an object. 你可以以编程方式管理通过添加和删除对象。You can programmatically manage the by adding and removing objects. 若要将节点添加到集合中，使用或方法。To add nodes to the collection, use the or method. 若要从集合中删除节点，使用， ，或方法。To remove nodes from the collection, use the , , or method. > [!NOTE] > 当控件绑定到数据源，和集合会自动填充每次出现时绑定。When the control is bound to a data source, the and collections are automatically populated each time binding occurs. 对之间的绑定的集合的任何更改将会丢失。Any changes to the collections between bindings will be lost. 若要保留这些更改，请更新数据源或手动重新生成的每当你将绑定的集合。To retain these changes, either update the data source or manually rebuild the collection each time you bind. 包含属性和方法，可用于检索有关集合本身的信息。The contains properties and methods that allow you to retrieve information about the collection itself. 若要找出多少项在集合中，使用属性。To find out how many items are in the collection, use the property. 如果你想要确定集合是否包含某一特定对象，请使用方法。If you want to determine whether the collection contains a certain object, use the method. 若要获取的索引对象在集合中，使用方法。To get the index of a object in the collection, use the method. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何以编程方式将节点添加到以及从其中移除这些。The following example demonstrates how to programmatically add nodes to and remove them from a . 请注意，和属性返回对象。Notice that the and properties return a object. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeNodeCollectionAdd#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeCollectionAdd/CS/treenodecollectionaddcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeNodeCollectionAdd#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeCollectionAdd/VB/treenodecollectionaddvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 用默认值初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the default values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数初始化的新实例类使用的默认值。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class using the default values. 不需要的父节点 （或所有者），此构造函数通常使用时创建的根节点的集合。This constructor is commonly used when creating a collection of root nodes where a parent node (or owner) is not required. > [!NOTE] > 在创建非根节点的集合时，应使用重载构造函数采用`owner`参数，而不是此构造函数，用于指定的父节点。When creating a collection of non-root nodes, you should use the overloaded constructor that takes the `owner` parameter, instead of this constructor, to specify the parent node. 主要由控件开发人员使用此构造函数。This constructor is used primarily by control developers.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode owner) cil managed

param.name: owner
param.span: 表示集合的父节点的 对象。

span.span: The object that represents the parent node of the collection.

summary.span: 使用指定的父节点（或所有者）初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified parent node (or owner).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数初始化的新实例类使用的指定的父节点 （或所有者）。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class using the specified parent node (or owner). 你需要指定父节点，此构造函数通常使用在创建非根节点的集合时。This constructor is commonly used when creating a collection of non-root nodes where you need to specify the parent node. > [!NOTE] > 在创建时的根节点集合，请考虑使用默认构造函数，因为根节点没有父节点。When creating a collection of root nodes, consider using the default constructor because root nodes do not have a parent node. 主要由控件开发人员使用此构造函数。This constructor is used primarily by control developers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来确定中的项的数目。Use the property to determine the number of items in a . 此属性常用当循环访问集合以确定集合中的上限。This property is commonly used when iterating through a collection to determine the upper bound of the collection. 属性通常还用于确定集合是否为空。The property is also commonly used to determine whether a collection is empty. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来确定中的项的数目。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the number of items in the . 然后它又执行的前序遍历控件来显示每个节点的文本。It then performs a preorder traversal of the control to display the text of each node. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法创建的枚举数可以轻松地循环获取每个项。Use the method to create an enumerator that can be easily iterated through to get each item in the . 若要获取当前指向的枚举器中的项，请使用属性。To get the item currently pointed to in the enumerator, use the property. 使用方法来移动到下一项。Use the method to move to the next item. 如果你需要将枚举器移回集合的开头，使用方法。If you need to move the enumerator back to the beginning of the collection, use the method. > [!NOTE] > 创建一个枚举器或使用后方法时，必须调用方法。After you create an enumerator or use the method, you must call the method. 否则，表示的项属性是不确定。Otherwise, the item represented by the property is undefined. 作为替代方法，你可以使用方法来创建可以用于访问集合中的项的对象。As an alternative, you can also use the method to create an object that can be used to access the items in the collection. 另一种方法是使用`foreach`或`For Each`结构来循环访问集合。Another alternative is to use a `foreach` or `For Each` structure to iterate through the collection. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法来创建包含的根节点的枚举控件。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to create an enumerator that contains root nodes of the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法从集合中移除指定的节点。Use the method to remove the specified node from the collection. 然后按照该节点的所有项都将上都移以填充空出的位置。All items that follow that node are then moved up to fill in the vacant position. 移动项的索引也将更新。The indexes of the moved items are also updated. > [!NOTE] > 可以包含空引用 (在 Visual Basic 中 Nothing)，以及重复对象。The can contain null references (Nothing in Visual Basic), as well as duplicate objects. 作为替代方法，你可以通过删除位于特定索引处的节点方法。As an alternative, you can remove a node at a specific index by using the method. 你还可以删除每个节点在集合中使用方法。You can also remove every node in the collection by using the method. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法以编程方式移除节点从。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to programmatically remove a node from the . 请注意，和每个属性返回对象。Notice that the and properties each return a object. value.span: 可用于同步对 的访问的 。

span.span: A that can be used to synchronize access to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供的同步的版本可以与同步 （线程） 的代码使用。The property provides a synchronized version of the that can be used with synchronizing (threading) code. > [!CAUTION] > 属性的类始终返回`false`，这指示类同步 （非线程安全）。The property of this class always returns `false`, which indicates that the class is not synchronized (not thread safe). 同步代码必须在执行操作对象，而不是直接在本身。Synchronizing code must perform operations on the object of the , not directly on the itself. 这样可确保对从其他对象派生的集合正确地执行操作。This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects. 具体地说，这样可保持正确的同步，与可能同时对修改其他线程对象。Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the object. > [!NOTE] > 在此实现中返回的对象是对象用于存储集合中的对象。The object returned in this implementation is the object used to store the objects in the collection. 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads could still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. 有关详细信息属性，请参阅属性接口。For more information on the property, see the property of the interface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo(class System.Array array, int32 index) cil managed

param.name: array
param.span: 从零开始的一个 对象，它接收从 复制的项。

span.span: A zero-based object that receives the copied items from the .

param.name: index
param.span: 目标数组中开始接收复制内容的位置。

span.span: The position in the target array at which to start receiving the copied content.

summary.span: 从目标数组的指定索引开始，将 对象中的所有项复制到兼容的一维 中。

span.span: Copies all the items from the object to a compatible one-dimensional , starting at the specified index in the target array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法的内容复制到指定从零开始对象。Use the method to copy the contents of the into the specified zero-based object. 目标数组的指定索引处开始复制项目。Items are copied starting at the specified index of the target array. 与对象，然后可以使用数组语法访问中的项。With the object, you can then use array syntax to access the items in the . 作为替代方法，你可以使用方法来创建用于访问集合中的项的枚举。As an alternative, you can also use the method to create an enumerator that can be used to access the items in the collection. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法复制的值到一个数组。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to copy the values of a into an array. 请注意，属性返回对象。Notice that the property returns a object. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeNodeCollectionCopyTo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeCollectionCopyTo/CS/treenodecollectioncopytocs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeNodeCollectionCopyTo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeCollectionCopyTo/VB/treenodecollectioncopytovb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 服务器控件，调用此方法后属性将返回`true`。After this method has been called on a server control, the property will return `true`.
